metadata.title: CVE-2017-7551 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: 389-ds-base version before 1.3.5.19 and 1.3.6.7 are vulnerable to password brute-force attacks during account lockout due to different return codes returned on password attempts.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.7.10-1ubuntu1').
